choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD_QUESTION (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(QNA_BOARD_QUESTION_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate,answered, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM QNA_BOARD_QUESTION) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
